duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a collection truck and provide prompt, courteous waste removal services for customers.
Perform complete pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle to ensure proper working order.
Operate manual and/or automatic controls to lift and load refuse and dispose of collected material.
Courteously interact with customers and ensure all customer routes are serviced in a timely and professional manner.
Identify unsatisfactory waste containers, tag containers, and monitor waste for evidence of unacceptable waste.
Clean up around accidental waste spills and ensure vehicle is operationally ready at all times.
Complete required route/productivity sheets, VCRs, and other reports as required.
Maintain adherence to required productivity standards and safety policies.
Actively participate in the Company’s ReSOP program and perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Class B or higher Commercial Driver’s license with air brakes endorsement.
